title: NightmareCity: Metropolitan Dread
script: The city breathes at night. Its breath smells of decay and forgotten dreams. Every street leads deeper into the maze. Every turn takes you further from home. Skyscrapers cast shadows that move when no one is watching. The city never sleeps, but something else is awake within it. you've always been part of its design. Between {mundane_object} and {mundane_object}, {horror_element} waits. {threat}.
